markdownRemark.html: Fifth project for the Treehouse Full-Stack JavaScript Techdegree. An application that for a fictional company called Awesome Startup, a distributed company with remote employees working all over the world. This application makes an AJAX call to a Random User Generator and display the response on the page. When the image or name is clicked a modal window is clicked with more detailed information, such as the employeeâ€™s birthday and address.
